abstract: Another two-hour edition of “So You Think You Can Dance” lifted Fox to No. 1 in the ratings on Wednesday, drawing an average of 8.7 million viewers from 8 to 10 p.m., according to Nielsen’s estimates.
lead_paragraph: Another two-hour edition of “So You Think You Can Dance” lifted Fox to No. 1 in the ratings on Wednesday, drawing an average of 8.7 million viewers from 8 to 10 p.m., according to Nielsen’s estimates.

headline.main: So You Think We Should Watch ‘CSI?’
